mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Settlement (conv_seq, rdate, cash, memo) VALUES (#{convSeq}, now(), #{cash}, #{memo})
mapper.select: SELECT s.seq AS seq, c.branch_name AS convName, s.rdate AS rdate, s.cash AS cash, s.memo AS memo FROM Settlement s JOIN Convenience c ON s.conv_seq = c.conv_seq WHERE s.conv_seq = #{convSeq} ORDER BY s.rdate DESC;
select count(*) FROM Settlement s JOIN Convenience c ON s.conv_seq = c.conv_seq where s.conv_seq = #{convSeq}
